EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Pivotal Big Data Suite. Changing the Economics of Big Data. Forever.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal made an exciting announcement this week that will change the economics of Big Data forever. The merging of traditional and next-generation data infrastructure technologies is defined as a “Business Data Lake” - a priority for CIOs in 2014 and beyond.
Register now for our upcoming webinar to learn how Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> fills a much-needed gap in the market to build a modern Business Data Lake architecture, removing the technical and financial constraints of data storage and movement.
Pay for what you analyze and not what you store with an annual subscription based software, support, and maintenance package that bundles Pivotal Greenplum Database, Pivotal GemFire, Pivotal SQLFire, Pivotal GemFire XD, Pivotal HAWQ, and Pivotal HD. With Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> you can store both structured and unstructured data, analyze multiple data sets in real-time, and build a Big Data application that better serves the needs of customers.
Find out your annual revenue savings using the Pivotal Big Data Suite Value Tool <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite>.
Tune in to our webinar <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/pivotal-big-data-suite-change-the-economics-of-big-data-forever> on April 23, Pivotal Big Data Suite: Change the Economics of Big Data. Forever.
REGISTER NOW >>
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
